description: The ID of this Google News result.
name: id

description: The ID of the Google News instance to which this Google News result belongs.
name: base_id

description: The type of to which this result belongs: 'desktop' - a result from the Google News desktop view; 'mobile_poster' - a result from the Google News mobile poster view; 'mobile' - a result from the Google News mobile view.
name: type

description: The index of this result within the list of results.
name: list_index

description: The title of this Google News result.
name: title

description: The subtitle of this Google News result.
name: subtitle

description: The image (as a Base64 string or URL) of this Google News result.
name: image_thumbnail

description: The publisher of this Google News result.
name: publisher

description: The time of publication of this Google News result.
name: time_of_publication

description: The source URL of this Google News result.
name: source_url
